textbox.innerHTML: <svg width='200' height='50' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='200' height='50' fill='white' stroke='black'/><text x='10' y='20' font-size='16' fill='grey' alignment-baseline='hanging'>Textbox</text></svg>

button.innerHTML: <svg width='100' height='50' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='100' height='50' fill='lightgrey' stroke='black'/><text x='50' y='25' font-size='16' text-anchor='middle' alignment-baseline='middle' fill='black'>Button</text></svg>

dropdown.innerHTML: <svg width='200' height='50' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='200' height='50' fill='white' stroke='black'/><polygon id='arrow' points='180,15 190,25 180,35' fill='black'/><text x='10' y='20' font-size='16' fill='grey' alignment-baseline='hanging'>Option 1</text></svg>

checkbox.innerHTML: <svg width='100' height='50' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='20' height='20' x='10' y='15' fill='white' stroke='black'/><polyline points='12,25 18,30 28,20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><text x='40' y='30' font-size='16' fill='black' alignment-baseline='middle'>Checkbox</text></svg>

toggle.innerHTML: <svg width='60' height='30' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect rx='15' ry='15' width='60' height='30' fill='#ddd' stroke='#999'/><circle cx='45' cy='15' r='12' fill='#fff' stroke='#999'/></svg>

label.innerHTML: <svg width='100' height='30' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><text x='10' y='20' font-size='16' fill='black' alignment-baseline='middle'>Label</text></svg>
